channel.title: Scientist Model Tie Glitch
channel.description:
Hey all, just a small glitch with the ties of Scientists. At any point after you meet Issac Kliener, where a scientist moves more than around a little bit at their devices (i.e. when a scientist will follow, or escort you,) their tie will shake violently; (observe Kliener's tie, and this will continue as long as this is stared at.) [img]https://puu.sh/iPE5J.gif[/img] and after some time, the bone at which the tie is attached will extend into oblivion: [img]https://puu.sh/iPDK5.jpg[/img]
This is only really noticeable when Kliener first speaks to you, as well, I noticed ties will only extend once you meet Eli. The tie will be back in place once you look away and back at the scientist again, but I can only assume that it is because this resets the model. I tested on all model detail levels, and this still occurred, more so on low, I found.
If any other information or evidence is required, just let me know.
